title.native: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ
title.romaji: Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e

description:
Koudo Ikusei Senior High School is a leading school with state-of-the-art facilities. The students there have the freedom to wear any hairstyle and bring any personal effects they desire. Koudo Ikusei is like a utopia, but the truth is that only the most superior students receive favorable treatment.

Kiyotaka Ayanokouji is a student of D-class, which is where the school dumps its "inferior" students in order to ridicule them. For a certain reason, Kiyotaka was careless on his entrance examination, and was put in D-class. After meeting Suzune Horikita and Kikyou Kushida, two other students in his class, Kiyotaka's situation begins to change.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)
synonyms: ขอต้อนรับสู่ห้องเรียนนิยม (เฉพาะ) ยอดคน
歡迎來到實力至上主義的教室
Добро пожаловать в класс для особо одарённых

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Survival
tags.description: Centers around the struggle to live in spite of extreme obstacles.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

node.description: A Japanese writer who also works as a visual novel scenario writer.

__Doujin circle:__ MUGENKIDOU A (無限軌道A)

[Blog](http://mugenkidou.sakura.ne.jp/index.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomose_shunsaku) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/927278)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/lainnet01)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akashiro_aoi)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/93473950)

Worked as an assistant to [Shirou Oono](https://anilist.co/staff/132305/) in the late '90s.

Her involvement in the game and anime Kimi ga Nozomu Eien, where she voiced the role of one of the heroines, Haruka Suzumiya and performed and penned the theme songs and other songs relating to the series, has brought her much attention. Her single "Precious Memories", used as the opening theme song for the series' animated version was a success; it had a peak ranking of 17th place on the Oricon charts and charted for 13 weeks.[1] She has since performed songs for other games and anime, including series such as Muv-Luv, Chrono Crusade, My-HiME, My-Otome, and School Days.    Kuribayashi has performed as part of the group Wild 3nin Musume, whose other present members are Joy Max (a.k.a. Joy Max Maximum) and Kisho Taniyama (a.k.a. Jackie Yang). She also once paired with Chiaki Takahashi to form the group exige, where Takahashi was known as CT. Veronica.(From Wiki)

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akashiro_aoi)

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ezaki0403)

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/brunosangregorio/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/clayton.sangregorio)

Bruno Sangregório is an actor, dubbing artist, producer, dubbing coordinator and dubbing director, and also a teacher at the DuBrasil Dubbing Course for Actors. He is married to the voice actress [Luana Stteger](https://anilist.co/staff/197329/).

He also acts as a filmmaker, being a director and screenwriter for the company Intra7 Filmes. He is a founding member and collective director of the theatrical group Mídias Conexas.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/guilhermedebarros/)

Guilherme de Barros is a Brazilian actor and voice actor.

Twitter | Instagram Luis Navarro Arredondo is a Mexican voice actor. He is known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Barry Allen / Flash in The Flash and Dick Grayson / Robin in Titans. Non-Anime Roles: - Cal Kestis (Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order) - Aasim (The Walking Dead: The Final Season)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/abernalg) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/bernievoice/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/people/Alberto-Bernal-Doblaje/100063504073181/) **Alberto Bernal García** is a Mexican voice actor known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Nino Lahiffe in _Miraculous_, Liam Dumbar in _Teen Wolf_, Nom Nom in _We Bare Bears_ and Peter Parker / Spiderman in the _Marvel Cinematic Universe_. Non-Anime Roles: - Miles Morales (Spider-Man: Miles Morales) - Drew Stiles (Call of Duty: World at War II) - Sipes (Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare)

[Website](http://apphiayu.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/soymilkpudding)

Apphia Yu, also known as Ayu Sakata, is an American voice actress, director, and producer. She has worked on games such as Loren The Amazon Princess and Tales of Aravorn: Seasons of the Wolf, or for anime like Assassination Classroom. She is the founder of sakevisual, a company based in Dallas, Texas that makes original visual novel games. She is married to voice actor [Micah Solusod](https://anilist.co/staff/103686/).

(Source: Wikipedia)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/zachbolton6)

Also a line producer.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.

[Website](https://zaqzaqzaq.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/zaxic_r) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/zaq39/)

ZAQ began to learn the piano at age three. During her college years, her idol was Minori Chihara, and it was during this time she decided to become a singer. However, she failed all her auditions. In junior high school, her favorite bands were Mongol800 and Going Steady, two rock groups which she was addicted to. Self-taught, her composing and works were characterized by a unique style which is unrestricted by music theory and musicology.

Japanese music producer, composer, and arranger.

He was the sound producer for the group Remark Spirits until the end of 2009, under the name ナカツチトモヒロ.

Loves: Cats, Saunas and Ramen
Tools of the Trade: Pro Tools and Ableton Live

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/emilyneves)

Emily Marie Neves is an American voice actress, ADR director and script writer known for her work on English adaptations of Japanese anime shows and films associated with Funimation and Sentai Filmworks/Seraphim Digital. In 2005, she was a preliminary contestant for the fourth season of American Idol at the Las Vegas auditions, where she advanced to the Hollywood round and was eliminated. She was a resident actress at the Alley Theatre in Houston. She was previously married to fellow anime voice actor [Andrew Love](https://anilist.co/staff/96848/Andrew-Love) and was roommates with [Maxey Whitehead](https://anilist.co/staff/103722/Maxey-Whitehead) in college.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - What is evil? Whatever springs from weakness.
Episode 2 - It takes a great talent and skill to conceal one's talent and skill.
Episode 3 - Man is an animal that makes bargains: no other animal does this - no dog exchanges bones with another.
Episode 4 - We should not be upset that others hide the truth from us, when we hide it so often from ourselves.
Episode 6 - There are two kinds of lies; one concerns an accomplished fact, the other concerns a future duty.
Episode 7 - Nothing is as dangerous as an ignorant friend; a wise enemy is to be preferred
Episode 8 - Abandon all hope, ye who enter here.
Episode 9 - Man is condemned to be free.
Episode 10 - Every man has in himself the most dangerous traitor of all
Episode 11 - What people commonly call fate is mostly their own stupidity.
Episode 12 - Genius lives only one story above madness.
